post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hi Brendan,
Please let me know if you are interested.
8.5 months Senior Programmer Analyst – National Ambulatory Care Reporting System
Requirement:
The Senior Programmer Analyst will work under the direction of the Technical Lead as part of a technical development team. This work is to be performed in our Toronto Office and the expected timeframe for completion is the end of December 2009.
Knowledge and Experience:
The successful candidate should have: • Extensive experience in IT development, testing and implementation of complex multiuser information systems (full development life cycle) in a web-based environment using industry-standard tools. • Demonstrated experience with systems development standards and methodologies, tools and techniques and quality assurance principles. • Extensive experience and proven expertise in web-based as well as back-end development using JAVA, JSP, JSTL, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, PL/SQL, ORACLE 9i and 10g, JDeveloper, Eclipse, WebLogic. • Good development experience using Struts and iBatis. • Solid understanding and experience using J2EE design patterns and best practices. • Experience with UML, Use Case Tools, MS Project, OOP. • Ability to understand and prioritise user and business requirements, and to conceptualise information processing solutions in response to them. • Ability to analyse, scope and define work effort required to correct program deficiencies and problems. • Ability to effectively plan and coordinate workload effectively. • Strong team player with a client/user orientation focus. • Excellent interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to communicate complex ideas/processes in simple terminology and create technical documentation. • Sun Java Developer Certification is a definite asset. • Familiarity with health informatics is desirable. • Fluency in both official languages is desirable.
Scope of Work:
During the effective date of this agreement, the contractor will perform the tasks outlined below:
1. Work as part of a technical team to develop information systems, to include the full range of requirements and feasibility analysis, design, coding, testing, quality assurance, implementation and documentation, as well as system application upgrades. 2. Maintain ongoing contact with client to ensure client satisfaction by meeting their needs through information systems development, enhancements and/or customizations. 3. Analyze and generate solutions to resolve software design and program deficiencies/problems in existing or new systems. May be required to oversee and ensure timely analysis and generation of solutions for the project team. 4. Analyze software change requests and implement the changes within the information systems. May be required to oversee and ensure timely implementation of change requests for the project team. 5. Develops, modifies and executes test plans and test cases and ensures the correct testing and sign-off procedures which are part of CIHI’s quality assurance review. 6. Participates in the planning, development and delivery of end user training. 7. Participates in the definition and selection of appropriate tools and techniques to support CIHI’s standards and methodologies. 8. Demonstrates a thorough understanding of systems development standards and methodologies, quality assurance principles and processes, tools and techniques and best practices.
Deliverables: 1. The contractor will participate in the development of information systems to include design, coding, full range of testing and implementation 2. The contractor will create required technical documentation according to CIHI’s standards and methodologies. 3. The contractor will develop test cases and execute unit, module and system integration test plans and conduct comprehensive testing of information systems according to CIHI’s quality assurance standards and processes. 4. The contractor will conduct end user training as required. 5. The contractor will provide oral briefings on an ongoing basis to appraise CIHI’s Technical Lead and/or IT Service Manager as to the project status, challenges, risks and performance.
Regards,
Lisa Titian Senior Account Manager (416) 483-7424 ext. 236 FAX: (416) 483-7676 1212
post.title: [Contract] Senior Programmer Analyst - Struts & iBatis exp
